description: Optional. If set, configures this repository to be linked to a Git remote.

authenticationTokenSecretVersion.description: Required. The name of the Secret Manager secret version to use as an authentication token for Git operations. Must be in the format `projects/*/secrets/*/versions/*`.

defaultBranch.description: Required. The Git remote's default branch name.

tokenStatus.description: Output only. Indicates the status of the Git access token.
